name: Path (Tobias O Norum, CharlotteMolnar, adelenjohansen, HvrdGames)
name_original: Path (Tobias O Norum, CharlotteMolnar, adelenjohansen, HvrdGames)
description:
Discover the calming beauty of nature as you find yourself on a luscious path, collecting mementos from your adventurous childhood Path is a short story driven game developed by Compass Studio, a student made studio made up of four BA Game Design student at Kristiania University College in Oslo, Norway.

Made by:

Tobias Okkenhaug Norum - System Administrator, Programmer, Technical Designer

Charlotte Victoria Molnar - Story & Narrative, Level Designer, UI 

Adelèn Johansen - Story & Narrative, Level Designer

Håvard Olsen - Programmer, Technical Designer

Extra:

David Menkin - Voice Acting

Peder B. Helland - Music
